title: How Travel Rules Are Easing Around the World
sub_head: Travelers are finding fewer vaccine and testing requirements to enter many countries. Here’s what to know about the latest changes.
body:
The Covid-19 rules for travelers are changing again. But this time, they’re getting easier.
Countries including Ireland, Iceland and Norway have eliminated all rules related to testing and vaccination for travelers. Others, such as France and England, have eliminated pre-departure testing for fully vaccinated people entering the country.
